item.title: October 2019 Set 2
item.description: October 2019 Set 2 This game would be fucking awesome if it wasn’t such shit! At this point I’m just loosing my mind, bcs I see on reddit and the RSI site that this is a bug that persists for more than a year COVALEX SHIPPING KIOSK SPAWNING RANDOM BOXES NPCS GET STUCK IN PORT OLISAR Talk about putting the game’s bugs on displayâ€¦
